key.name: clipboard-mode
key.description: Use CLIPBOARD (Ctrl+V) instead of PRIMARY selection (middle-click)

key.name: auto-paste
key.description: Automatically type the transcribed text at cursor position

key.name: wrap-marker
key.description: Wrap transcribed text with speech-to-text:"..." to provide context to LLMs

key.name: auto-enter
key.description: Send Return/Enter key after auto-pasting (requires auto-paste to be enabled)

key.name: streaming-mode
key.description: Use real-time streaming transcription with VAD (auto-stops on silence). Requires RealtimeSTT to be installed.

key.name: language
key.description: Language for speech recognition: "system" uses desktop locale, or specify a language code like "en"

key.name: show-notifications
key.description: Show desktop notifications for recording status and transcription results
